fr.theshark34.supdate

Class FileIgnorer

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.theshark34.supdate.FileIgnorer

  • public class FileIgnorer
extends java.lang.Object
    The FileIgnorer

    This class contains a method to get a list of files to keep when deleting the useless files.
